bestIdea.name: The Iditarod Trail
bestIdea.description: Follow the historic Iditarod Trail, a route that spans the frozen tundra of Alaska, famous for the annual sled dog race. Experience the harsh, icy conditions and breathtaking landscapes as you traverse this legendary path.

otherIdeas.name: The Frostfangs Journey
otherIdeas.description: Venture through the Frostfangs, a treacherous mountain range in the world of Westeros from 'Game of Thrones'. Navigate the icy peaks and frozen valleys, encountering mythical creatures and ancient mysteries along the way.

possibleSteps.endingLocation: The Fist of the First Men

possibleSteps.startingLocation: The Fist of the First Men

otherIdeas.name: The Siberian Traverse
otherIdeas.description: Embark on a journey across the vast Siberian tundra, experiencing the extreme cold and remote wilderness. This route takes you through some of the most isolated and breathtaking landscapes on Earth.

otherIdeas.name: The White Walkers' Path
otherIdeas.description: Follow the path of the White Walkers from 'Game of Thrones', traversing the icy lands beyond the Wall. This route takes you through the heart of the frozen wilderness, where danger lurks at every turn.
